channel.description: Recent content in Cognitive Aging on Guanyi Yang

item.title: üåç Cross-national Cognitive Aging and MCI Classification (HRS-HCAP, Mex-Cog, LASI-DAD)
item.description: Statistical modeling of MCI subtypes across U.S., Mexican, and Indian cohorts, integrating harmonized cognitive measurement with regression-based inference.

item.title: üá≥üáµ Nepal HCAP Cognitive Assessment Adaptation
item.description: Psychometric adaptation and validation of cognitive assessments for low-literacy older adults in Nepal, improving measurement equity and cross-national comparability in dementia research.
